movie.title: Beetle juice
movie.description: A recently deceased couple attempts to scare away the new inhabitants of their former home with the help of a mischievous ghost named Beetlejuice.

movie.title: Deadpool
movie.description: Wade Wilson, a mercenary, gains superpowers and seeks revenge after undergoing an experimental treatment that disfigures him.

movie.title: Despicable Me 4
movie.description: Gru, Lucy, and their daughters return for new adventures with the Minions.

movie.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movie.description: Captain Jack Sparrow navigates treachery and supernatural elements on the high seas.
